text: Ezɨ Enselɨn Ovevem Inigha Izim, otarir ivariabav soghasava ami, ezɨ Moses Enselɨn arazir kam apɨrsɨ, a Israelba akam me ganɨga ghaze, me sipsipɨn ghuzim isɨ uan tiar akaba bar dar aghefegh. Dughiar kamɨn Moses nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn ikia, egha arazir kam me ganɨngi, ezɨ tuavir kamɨn God Israelbagh Itazir Dughiamɨn Isar Ekiam gamizɨ, an oto.
